sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fortune</radical> <radical>boil</radical>s down to a single <kanji>point</kanji> in time. One point in time determines how the rest of your future will go.
meaningInfo: Imagine actually going somewhere to get your fortune told and watching a big boiling pot of goo. As it boils, it melts down to a single point at the very bottom. Where this point is determines your future.
readingMnemonic: As you stare at the <kanji>point</kanji>, you watch in awe as it moves to the <reading>ten</reading> (<ja>てん</ja>) spot in a long series of numbers.
readingInfo: Is the ten spot good? Are you going to live a long life or does this point mean you're only going to live ten more years?! Ahh!
